name: kql
description: Performs a KQL query. Returns true if the provided KQL query string matches the row.

params.name: query
params.description: Query string in KQL query string format.

params.name: query
params.description: Query string in KQL query string format.

examples:
FROM books 
| WHERE KQL("author: Faulkner")
| KEEP book_no, author 
| SORT book_no 
| LIMIT 5;
